text.en: One and only father of the victors of the three times, Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwé yab chikjampéyang

text.en: In order to share a festival of Dharma, profound and vast,
text.en-trans: zabgyéchökyigatön pel ledu

text.en: You assumed the form of a supreme spiritual guide of peerless intellect—
text.en-trans: lodrötsungmé shenyen chok gi kur

text.en: Sovereign guru, I pray that your life may remain secure.
text.en-trans: yong shar khyabdak lama zhabten sol

text.en: On the stable pole of the rules of well-spoken Vinaya,
text.en-trans: lek sung dulwé trim kyi yuwa ten

text.en: Flutters the silken flag of the two types of bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: changchub sem nyi dar gyi lhab lhub yo

text.en: With the jewel of great secret ripening and liberating at its crest—
text.en-trans: sang chen mindrol norbü tok denpa

text.en: To this supreme victory banner of the fully observed teaching, I bow.
text.en-trans: yongdzin tenpé gyaltsen chok la dü

text.en: Your mindstream is enriched by a wealth of prodigious study,
text.en-trans: mangdu töpé nor gyi gyü chuk ching

text.en: Your misconceptions eliminated through contemplation of meaning—
text.en-trans: dedön sampé drondok nang né chö

text.en: To you, whose body of realization is strengthened through the nectar
text.en-trans: tsechik gompé tingdzin dütsi yi

text.en: Of single-pointed meditative absorption, I bow.
text.en-trans: tokpé lü tob gyepa dé la dü

text.en: You have the eyes of the twofold wisdom of omniscience,
text.en-trans: khyenpé yeshe zung gi chen dangden

text.en: You guide and care for beings with loving compassion
text.en-trans: tsewé tukjé dro kün jesu dzin

text.en: And your power is the splendour of scripture and realization—
text.en-trans: gang gi nüpa lungtok tenpé pal

text.en: Incomparable and noble guru, at your feet I bow.
text.en-trans: tsungmé lama dampé zhab la dü

text.en: The elegance of your exposition is a splendour to the fortunate,
text.en-trans: chepé lek shé kalden duljé pal

text.en: The rationality of your debate destroys opponents with wrong views,
text.en-trans: tsöpé rikpé pé gol lokta jom

text.en: And your garlanded compositions are ornaments to beautify the victor’s teachings—
text.en-trans: tsom treng gyalten dzepé gyen gyurpa

text.en: Superlative master of expression, at your feet I bow.
text.en-trans: mawé wangpo chok gi zhab la dü

text.en: With non-referential love, you constantly watch over disciples
text.en-trans: nyikdü gangchen bö kyi dulja la

text.en: Of this snowy land of Tibet at this degenerate time,
text.en-trans: mikmé tsewé tuk kyi tak gong shing

text.en: And with the limitless beneficence of the four means of attraction
text.en-trans: du ngö zhi yi lek dzé tayepé

text.en: You extend the celebration of benefit and happiness—at your feet I bow.
text.en-trans: pendé gatön pel dzé zhab la dü

text.en: Through the power of praying with one-pointed devotion in this way,
text.en-trans: detar tsechik güpé soltab tü

text.en: May the Sage’s flawless teachings spread throughout the ten directions,
text.en-trans: drimé tubten chok chur gyepa dang

text.en: May the lives of the sublime masters who uphold the teachings remain secure,
text.en-trans: tendzin kyechok zhabpé takten ching

text.en: And may utterly pure enlightened actions flourish.
text.en-trans: namkar trinlé gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: Throughout every land may the evil signs of this degenerate age,
text.en-trans: yul chok küntu né muk truktsö sok

text.en: Such as disease, famine and warfare, be wholly pacified,
text.en-trans: nyikmé dü té ngenpa kün zhi né

text.en: And, as all beings revel in the glory of the ten virtues,
text.en-trans: dro kün gé chü pal la chöpa sok

text.en: May we savour the splendours of a new golden era.
text.en-trans: dzokden sarpé dé jor gyepar dzö

text.en: For us, in particular, from now until awakening,
text.en-trans: khyepar dakchak deng né changchub bar

text.en: May you guide and care for us inseparably, O protector.
text.en-trans: gönpo khyö kyi dralmé jezung zhing

text.en: May we complete the stages of study, contemplation and meditation,
text.en-trans: tö sam gompé rimpa tarchin né

text.en: And swiftly attain the stage of all-encompassing insight.
text.en-trans: tamché zikpé gopang nyur tob shok
